Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I discovered Kerbal last week and my life has been on hold ever since! What a fantastic game, I love it. The first computer game I ever played was Lander on the Apple II, boy things have moved on a bit since then. Kerbal also reminds me of ELITE, I love the feeling of freedom to customise a spaceship, go anywhere and do anything.

From this...

To this...

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

About that quote in your sig Jupiter, have you ever considered there is no missing link because Kerbals are intelligent grass?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

About that quote in your sig Jupiter, have you ever considered there is no missing link because Kerbals are intelligent grass?

That just blew my mind.

About that quote in your sig Jupiter, have you ever considered there is no missing link because Kerbals are intelligent grass?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Now that would explain everything.

Bedazzled, welcome to the forums!

Have fun!

About that quote in your sig Jupiter, have you ever considered there is no missing link because Kerbals are intelligent grass?

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

Hmm, I never though of that. Over-grown grass that became intelligent.

It seems Bedazzled is bedazzled!

KSP is such and addicting game, with a great forum to go along with it too.

Welcome to KSPF! :cheers:

Welcome!

Enjoy your stay.

On the mean time why is everyone getting on the mun but me?!

I have been playing since like KSP 11.0.0...

Of course the mun was implemented later,but I still have rocket skills.

I orbited the (insert sun like star name here.).

Cheers for the warm welcome guys, I\'m loving this game. Some recent snaps; did some roving on the mun then went somewhere sunny for my hols:

8)

Very funny joke...

I orbited kerbol (Kerbals sun.) already...
